title: Dileu’r hawliad cyfan neu ran o’r hawliad

content.text: Gallwch ofyn i’r tribiwnlys ddileu’r cyfan neu rannau o’r hawliad.
[W]If something is ‘struck out’ it is removed from the claim or response and cannot be relied upon.
Gall y tribiwnlys ddileu’r cyfan neu rannau o hawliad yr hawlydd o’i wirfodd ei hun neu yn dilyn cais gan yr atebydd.
Rhaid i gais i ddileu fod yn seiliedig ar o leiaf un o agweddau Rheol 37 Rheolau Trefniadaeth y Tribiwnlysoedd Cyflogaeth.
Manylion i’w cynnwys yn eich cais:

items: why you think the claim (or parts of it) should be struck out
which ground or grounds in Rule 37 you say applies in this case
if you are referring to numbered points or paragraphs in a claim, include these numbers or other references
